EmailTemplate.name: ENSI Material - Tracking details
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI Workshop materials for {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program - Tracking details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Job__c.NAM_Name__c}
Just letting you know that the ENSI materials for the {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} program are on their way. {!Job__c.Materials_delivery_number_of_boxes__c} boxes should be delivered to {!Job__c.Delivery_Company_Name__c} by the end of next week. The boxes have been addressed to {!Job__c.Delivery_Contact_Person__c}'s attention.
For reference, the DHL Tracking details are: {!Job__c.Materials_delivery_tracking_number__c} and can be tracked here. OR For reference, the TNT Tracking details are: {!Job__c.Materials_delivery_tracking_number__c} and can be tracked here.
Kind regards
